trends: There have been 9 other sightings in San Angelo
There were 3 other sightings in San Angelo on or around October 10th 2010
divs: sighting detailsthis is response to the person in mo. who saw the large orange object. i saw the very same thing in san angelo texas on 10\10\10 sunday at 8:30pm. it was very bright orange and pulsating. it was about 900 ft above my house. it went over my house and my neighbor's house behind my house. it did not make a sound at all. this was not a plane, helicopter, or balloon. it flew from the south heading north. this was the strangiest thing i have ever seen. i wonder what this was?
